    • Constructor Detail

      • Alarm

        public Alarm(android.content.Context context,
     Medicine medicine,
     int amount,
     DayEnum[] days,
     int hour,
     int minute,
     java.util.GregorianCalendar startDate,
     java.util.GregorianCalendar endDate)
        Constructor without alarm ID
        Parameters:
        context - the context from which the alarm will be executed
        medicine - the medicine to display on the alarm
        amount - the amount the patient has to take in
        days - which days of the week does this patient need to take this medicine in
        hour - at which hour of the day does this patient need to take this medicine in
        minute - at which minute of the hour does this patient need to take this medicine in
        startDate - at which date does the alarm need to start happening
        endDate - at which date does the alarm need to stop happening (1-1-1970 to make it go infinitely)
        See Also:
        Medicine, GregorianCalendar

      • Alarm

        public Alarm(int id,
     android.content.Context context,
     Medicine medicine,
     int amount,
     DayEnum[] days,
     int hour,
     int minute,
     java.util.GregorianCalendar startDate,
     java.util.GregorianCalendar endDate)
        Constructor with alarm ID
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the alarm
        context - the context from which the alarm will be executed
        medicine - the medicine to display on the alarm
        amount - the amount the patient has to take in
        days - which days of the week does this patient need to take this medicine in
        hour - at which hour of the day does this patient need to take this medicine in
        minute - at which minute of the hour does this patient need to take this medicine in
        startDate - at which date does the alarm need to start happening
        endDate - at which date does the alarm need to stop happening (1-1-1970 to make it go infinitely)
        See Also:
        Medicine, GregorianCalendar
